[00:00.51]goodnight n go (Explicit) - Ariana Grande
[00:01.78]Lyricist：Scootie/Michael Foster/Victoria Monét/Tommy "TBHits" Brown/Ariana Grande
[00:03.27]Composer：Scootie/Michael Foster/Victoria Monét/Tommy "TBHits" Brown/Ariana Grande
[00:04.80]Studio Personnel：John Hanes/Serban Ghenea
[00:05.57]Mixer：Serban Ghenea
[00:06.00]Assistant Mixer：John Hanes
[00:06.57]Cover Of：Goodnight and Go by Imogen Heap
[00:08.99]Tell me why you gotta look at me that way
[00:12.03]You know what it does to me
[00:14.32]So baby what you tryna say
[00:17.53]Lately all I want is you on top of me
[00:20.93]You know where your hands should be
[00:22.87]So baby won't you come show me
[00:26.18]I got you I got you dreamin'
[00:28.29]You close your eyes and you're screamin'
[00:30.56]Play with your mind for no reason
[00:32.59]I know you love how I tease it
[00:35.16]You know that I'm playin'
[00:37.35]So don't be mistaken
[00:39.09]You already know what I'm thinkin' boy
[00:42.19]Oh why'd you have to be so cute
[00:46.42]It's impossible to ignore you ah
[00:50.62]Why must you make me laugh so much
[00:55.05]It's bad enough we get along so well
[00:59.41]Just say goodnight and go
[01:08.41]Just say goodnight and go
[01:16.84]Just say goodnight and go
[01:18.56]One of these days
[01:20.54]You'll miss your train and come stay with me
[01:25.04]It's always say goodnight and go
[01:27.15]We'll have drinks and talk about things
[01:30.98]And any excuse to stay awake with you
[01:35.42]And you'd sleep here and I'd sleep there
[01:39.89]But then the heating may be down again
[01:42.73]At my convenience
[01:44.44]We'd be good we'd be great together
[01:51.79]Why'd you have to be so cute
[01:55.55]It's impossible to ignore you ah
[01:59.80]Why must you make me laugh so much
[02:04.16]It's bad enough we get along so well
[02:08.79]Just say goodnight and go
[02:17.36]Just say goodnight and go
[02:18.83]I know how you want it baby
[02:20.06]Just like this
[02:20.85]Know you're thinking 'bout it
[02:21.81]Baby just one kiss
[02:22.95]While you're looking at em
[02:23.94]Baby read my lips
[02:25.02]I know what you want
[02:26.18]but you can't have this
[02:44.72]Want to say goodnight
[02:46.84]Want to say goodnight and go
[02:48.88]Want to say goodnight
[02:51.00]Baby say goodnight and go
[02:53.12]Want to say goodnight
[02:56.53]Say goodnight and go

[00:08.99]告诉我为何你用这样的眼神注视我
[00:12.03]你早就清楚 这会让我情不自禁
[00:14.32]亲爱的 你想说什么呢
[00:17.53]最近我只想感受你的体温
[00:20.93]你应该知道你的双手该放在哪里
[00:22.87]亲爱的 为何不来告诉我
[00:26.18]我让你 让你不禁幻想
[00:28.29]闭上眼睛 放声呼喊吧
[00:30.56]漫无目的撩动你的心弦
[00:32.59]我明白你就爱我挑逗你的方式
[00:35.16]你知道我在玩闹
[00:37.35]就不要误会我
[00:39.09]你早就清楚我的想法了 男孩
[00:42.19]噢 为何你如此可爱
[00:46.42]让我无法忽视你的存在
[00:50.62]为何非得让我这样大笑不止
[00:55.05]这可糟了 你我相处甚欢
[00:59.41]那就互道晚安 转身离去吧
[01:08.41]那就互道晚安 转身离去吧
[01:16.84]那就互道晚安 转身离去吧
[01:18.56]某一天
[01:20.54]你错过了火车 来到我身边
[01:25.04]晚安道别总是常事
[01:27.15]我们纵情畅饮 相谈甚欢
[01:30.98]在你身边没什么理由能让我保持理智清醒
[01:35.42]你安静入睡 而我也进入梦乡
[01:39.89]而那炽热的激情也渐渐归于平静
[01:42.73]在我方便的时候
[01:44.44]我们总是相处的很愉快 很和谐
[01:51.79]噢 为何你如此可爱
[01:55.55]让我无法忽视你的存在
[01:59.80]为何非得让我这样大笑不止
[02:04.16]这可糟了 你我相处甚欢
[02:08.79]那就互道晚安 转身离去吧
[02:17.36]那就互道晚安 转身离去吧
[02:18.83]亲爱的 我明白你需要我
[02:20.06]就像这样
[02:20.85]我清楚你的心意
[02:21.81]宝贝 只是一个深情热吻
[02:22.95]当你凝视着我的双唇
[02:23.94]宝贝 听我说
[02:25.02]我明白你的心意
[02:26.18]但现在你还不能拥有
[02:44.72]想跟你道声晚安
[02:46.84]想跟你道声晚安然后转身离去
[02:48.88]想跟你道声晚安
[02:51.00]宝贝 道声晚安转身离去吧
[02:53.12]想跟你道声晚安
